title: Effect of the Ca/P ratio of Ni-loaded hydroxyapatite on the catalytic decomposition of biomass tar at low temperatures
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2850-2859
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00250D, Paper
Naokatsu Kannari, Yusuke Yokota, Kazuki Onoduka, Anon Shimizu, Kazuyoshi Sato, Hiroyuki Okazaki, Shunya Yamamoto, Hiroya Abe
Ni-loaded catalysts using hydroxyapatite (HAp) supports with various Ca/P ratios are promising biomass tar decomposition catalysts at low gasification temperatures (i.e., 450 Â°C), and that variations in the Ca/P ratio of the HAp support allow tuning of the Ni dispersion state and catalytic activity.
